# norm_inf(_:)

**Function**

Returns the maximum absolute value of a vector.

## Declaration

```swift
func norm_inf(_ x: SIMD3<Double>) -> Double
```

## Vector Norm Functions

- **norm_one(_:)**: Returns the sum of the absolute values of a vector.
